description: The AWS::SNS::Topic resource creates a topic to which notifications can be published.

TopicArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the topic.

DisplayName.description: The display name to use for an SNS topic with SMS subscriptions.

Subscription.description: The SNS subscriptions (endpoints) for this topic.

Tags.description: The list of tags to add to a new topic.

Subscription.description: An SNS subscription associated with the topic.

Endpoint.description: The endpoint that receives notifications from the topic.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.
